note.p: Physician. MD, University College, London, 1846. Fellow, University College, London. Physician, South Staffordshire General Hospital, Wolverhampton, 1847–61. Consultant physician, Bridgenorth Infirmary. In Geneva, Switzerland, 1862–3; Rome, 1865–70; Torquay, 1871–4; Kensington, London, from 1876.
